entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NETSDKE2E][ARM64].net9preview4sdk can't be used on ARM64OS. #40694

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove the 7.0 template packages #40710
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Run the WinForms app test #40708
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #40707
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Show workload update notifications for workloads installed via Visual Studio #40705
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #40697
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2445874 #40693
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #40431
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Clean up STJ references Fixes #39902 #40645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add preview VS note to developer guide #40542
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reference latest MSBuild for netcore MSBuild stuff #40603
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #40640
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
